review: The only thing that seems to work well, with any consistency, is Amazon Prime video. Good luck trying to enjoy Netflix or Hulu.
author: Scott

review: The kids seem to like it. It was delivered same day I ordered it on a Sunday even. That was exciting!
author: Jiana R.

review: I simply love it. I have one for the kids and one for my living room and I can't think of anything that I don't like about the Fire TV. It has been the only device that I've owned that after a short tutorial was simply plug and play.
author: Julius

review: Fire TV is a huge improvement over other devices for accessing Amazon video content!  Menus are well designed, searching is easy and the device responds smoothly & quickly.  Movies start playing almost instantly without any buffering issues.  Although the unit doesn't have the overall high quality look & feel as Apple TV, it performs well and I'm happy with the purchase.
author: SJDiv

review: Great device, small yet powerful, slick interface, has all the apps and subscriptions I want, and inexpensive to boot. Couldn't be happier with my purchase! It would be nice if the next generation supported 802.11ac, but it's been running great on 5GHz 802.11n.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This thing is sweet. No problems, runs quickly, easy to use and navigate. Streams videos (Amazon Prime in this case) flawlessly.
author: Anthony Olivieri

review: one word: awesome.  The interface is incredibly user friendly and intuitive.  well done Amazon
author: UMCPTERP

review: Love it. Easy to set up and use.
author: Amazon Customer
